transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Ji good afternoon sir.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Sir main Tejas baat kar raha hun IndiaMART company se.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir kya hai sir aapko call kal kiya tha regarding ek concern raise hui thi. Actually kya ho raha hai sir jo hamare IndiaMART ki services hai woh aap kafi time se use nahi kar rahe hain, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh koi exactly reason hai jiske wajah se aap ye use nahi kar rahe hain? Kyunki bilkul disengaged hai matlab yahan pe bilkul bhi aap apne end se buyleads vagera consume nahi kar rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi buyleads vagera use hi nahi hota hai. Jo bhi aap buyleads deta hai na woh useless hai. Humko use hi nahi hota hai. Hamara wall products hai.
Executive: Aapka relevancy ke according nahi aa raha hai buyleads?
Customer: Haan relevancy nahi aata hai and 99% unnecessarily jo bhi non-relevant rehte hai woh aata hai humko time waste karne ka nahi hai.
Executive: Toh like aap jab jaise aapke paas aata hai toh like aapko pehle like mere se pehle aapke mam ki baat hoti hogi Priyanshi mam ki aapko agar yaad ho toh unhone aapko matlab meeting vagera nahi kara tha schedule ki aapko not relevant vagera ka feature rehta hai hamara filter vagera ka usage rehta hai. Filter vagera se apni leads vagera ko
Customer: Haan woh rehte hai but kitna karne ka because aapka kya hota hai switch box bol hamara switch box for valves hai but aapka switch box woh ghar ka switch box woh ghar vagera itna aata hai woh humko non-relevant hota hai time time waste ho jata hai woh check karne ke liye bhi.
Executive: Achha aapka jaise maan ke chaliye solenoid valves aata hai, right?
Customer: Ya category mein jo aapke paas available hai limit switch hamara major hai limit switch box for valves.
Executive: Achha limit switch. Thik hai limit switches hai aapke paas.
Customer: Khali limit switch limit switch for limit switch matlab woh kya hota hai ki woh generalize category ho jata hai hamara actually but particularly limit switch for valve application hota hai.
Executive: Achha ek specific category pe hi woh kaam hota hai aapka aisa.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Jaise electronic switch hai electronic switch bhi isme aata hai.
Executive: Competitor bolo toh abhi competitor bolo toh CARE hai dekho C A I R.
Customer: Haan haan thik hai. Woh hamara thik hai hamara competitor hai.
Executive: Achha ye kahan ye aapko jo bata rahe hai CARE toh badi brand hai na sir CARE woh.
Customer: Badi bolo toh utna toh badi nahi hai hai.
Executive: Aap hi ke segment ki toh hai ye achi khasi.
Customer: Ye matlab aap hi ke toh category mein aati hai na sir.
Executive: Haan haan haan barabar hai. Hai na isi mein deal karte hai.
Customer: Haan uska jo bhi aisa buyleads chahiye humko woh buyleads nahi aata humko.
Executive: Okay aapne apna ye product jo hai add kar rakha hai apne catalog ke andar sir?
Customer: Haan add karke rakha hai na.
Executive: Catalog pe add hai. Aaj actually kya hai main dekh raha tha ki kafi sare na aapke products mein na in mapping ho rahi hai. Matlab product ye hai ki jis particular like search result pe jaise maan ke chaliye koi buyer hai jis naam se woh search kar raha hai woh search jo keyword hota hai na woh aapke particular product mein add hi nahi hai that's why aapko us relevancy ke according aapko woh keyword ka lead hi nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Pehli cheez ye hai main jo find kari. Haan ye hum jo definitely hum isko solve karenge. Second cheez kya hai aapki like catalog ke andar kafi sara enrichment ka zarurat hai. Matlab aise bahut sare products hai jisme like aapki taraf se kafi sare specifications vagera add nahi hai. Toh definitely humko usse bhi add karna hoga jisse woh visibility hona start ho. Kyunki kya rehta hai ultimately catalog toh live rehta hai IndiaMART pe. But the thing is ki agar usme photos vagera aur videos vagera nahi add hoti hai na toh kya rehta hai ki hamari side se woh aapki visibility kam ho jati hai. Visibility available nahi hoti hai. Hai na toh hame woh specifications hum add kar denge toh ek at least visibility start hogi. Third cheez ye hai sir humko one of the first thing hame ye karni hai ki hamara jo panel hai matlab hamara jo account hai is samay currently inactive hai. Okay toh hame kya karna hai pehle traffic gain karna hai. Har ek kind of category mein jisme aap deal kar rahe ho aur nahi bhi kar rahe ho aapke paas jo category add hai jaise agar main baat karu solenoid valves hai thik hai linear actuator hai electronic switch hai butterfly valves hai junction boxes hai air filter regulators hai hai na aur pneumatic actuators aata hai hai na butterfly valves aati hai toh ye jo apni jitni bhi categories aapko bata raha hu in sab categories mein particularly traffic achcha aata hai thik hai toh hame kya karna hai abhi hame in traffic ko gain karna hai pehle thik hai jab hamare paas utne number of inquiries ka flow aa jayega utne number of hamare paas buyers aana start ho jayenge fir hum start karenge filtering ka process. Filtering in the sense ye ki hamari relevancy ke andar kaun kaun sa aa raha hai kaun sa nahi aa raha hai usko hum not relevant mark karna start karenge. Thik hai ye procedure hai agar aap ye cheeze hum sare step complete kar lete hai char se panch definitely aapke account ka jo like pura system hai woh 180 degree mud jayega kyunki abhi tak aapke account pe jo kaam kiya gaya hai hai na mere se pehle jinka bhi aapne kaam kiya hai unhone actually woh achche tarike se aapko focus karke bataya nahi hai aur thoda sa kya raha hai ki aapke side se sir like thoda kehte hai na ki concern hota hai ki like hum karna chahte hai business toh hum thoda sa uske liye concern hai ki hum thoda bahut time nikal rahe hai daily ka toh thoda sa mere ko aapke liye bas wohi switch aapko support chahiye hoga thoda sa toh aap mere se like aaj sham ko free ho sakte hai kya 5 baje ke aas paas toh main thoda sa aapse connect karke thodi bahut buyleads consume karana start karu aur fir hum catalog ki mapping sahi karte hai pehle kyunki actually kya hai mujhe aapki help isliye chahiye kyunki aap hi bata sakte ho ki solenoid valves hai jaise thik hai ya fir maan ke chaliye ye apna jo electronic switch hai toh electronic switch ko hum kis kis category mein add kar sakte hai jisse hamara jo traffic hai woh zyada badh jaye. Ab electronic switch main toh apne end se add kar dunga do se teen category but zaruri nahi hai na ki jis category mein main add kar raha hu toh aap agar mujhe bata doge on on matlab meeting pe hi ki yaar ye hum usme add kar sakte hai ki nahi add kar sakte hai uske liye mujhe aapki help chahiye hogi support chahiye hoga. Taki definitely aap mere se aaj jude ho main aapko actually kafi time se bhi call kar raha tha but the thing is ki aap kahin na kahin busy ho that's why main aapse baat mera connection ho nahi paya hai na toh aap ek first thing ye kariyega abhi actually main jo call kar raha hu na sir toh main apni jo hai DID number se call kar raha hu like meri company ki jo assigned DID hai hai na aapke paas jo save hoga toh aap mera bhi main aapko isi same number pe aapka whatsapp bhi rehta hai na sir?
Customer: Haan rahega na.
Executive: Achha number aap mujhe ek baar tally karenge kya exact number hai sir apna?
Customer: 98
Executive: 98
Customer: 455
Executive: 455
Customer: 39
Executive: 39
Customer: 408
Executive: 408 thik hai sir apna good name aapka kya rehta hai sir?
Customer: Siddhesh Siddhesh.
Executive: Siddhesh okay aap Siddhesh sir hi baat kar rahe hai na toh aap hi decision maker hai aur aap hi company ka matlab pura handover chala rahe hai right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai main apne naam se Tejas naam hai sir mera aap mera ye number please save kar lijiyega because kya hai ki hame kafi sari cheeze sath mein solve karni hai. Dekhiye ultimately kya hota hai na sir aap ek platform pe hai jiska naam hai IndiaMART aur aap aaj pehli baar toh hai nahi aap kafi time se hamare IndiaMART platform pe hai right more than three or four years ho gaye hai. Ultimately aaj aap agar kisi plan mein hai meri company mein kisi bhi aap service ko involve karke baithe hai toh kahin na kahin aapka koi na koi conversation raha hoga ya fir aapko koi achcha conversion mila hoga definitely tabhi aapne apna plan achcha le rakha hai hai na aap jis plan mein hai woh maximizer hai jahan par bahut achchi visibility aur apna khud ka ek website ka traffic aata hai right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Toh the thing is ki we have to do one thing ki hame pehle ek achcha traffic gain karna hai then we will definitely do ki hum usme se kuch conversion leke aa paye hai na tabhi toh hum aage aapko aur achcha value service de paye kyunki ultimately hame toh sir kya hai na ki next time agar hum aapka time aayega upcoming like months mein fir hum aapse kahenge sir renew karaiye aap bhi kahenge ki yaar mera kaam hi nahi hua kuch vaisa ki main aapko like hai na kar pau ya fir aapko kuch achchi value de pau toh hame woh sab cheeze re-correct karni hai. Also the thing is sir ek concern hai jo raise hui hai jisme aapka definitely likh ke aaya hai ki aapki side se koi bhi like activeness nahi hai account pe hai na toh woh bhi please hame usko resolve karana hai because the company will ask me na ki I am the service partner and maine aapko kya resolution diya hai hai na toh dekhiye mere se aapki aaj baat hui ultimately main manta hu main apni taraf se koshish karta hu ya fir aapko umeed rakhta hu ki like maine apne end se jo cheeze aapko batai hai aapko woh cheeze samajh mein aayi hongi ki actual mein kya issue hai jiske wajah se hame ye sab result mil raha hai right? Aapka availability time kab kya rehta hai sir matlab aap already businessman hai aapko itna time nahi rehta hoga ki har samay aap free rehte ho toh kab available rehte hai aap mujhe batayenge thoda sa?
Customer: Hmm mushkil hai bolne ka but aapko 5 baje boliye call kariye.
Executive: Thik hai aaj 5 baje connect kar lete hai thik hai main ek meeting schedule kar raha hu hum on meeting aate hai I will show you ki exactly kya kya cheeze hai thik hai aur kuch cheeze main aapko aur batata hu jisse aap agar unhe use karna start karoge toh definitely you will get some results aur output to like aapko dikhega ki haan kuch engagement aa raha hai ab hai na fir hum aur aage discuss karenge aur achche aur procedures ko follow karenge thik hai aap mera number save kar lijiyega main 5 baje ke aas paas aapko connect karta hu.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai okay thank you sir.
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Customer's account is currently inactive.

- Lack of activeness on the customer's account.



Resolution:

- Executive will help with catalog mapping.

- Executive will schedule a meeting to discuss buyleads.

- Executive will add specifications to improve visibility.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled for 5 PM to discuss issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, relevancy, traffic, specifications
